      Swaps to Ranking by Attempt view

        public void setAttemptInfo(java.lang.String attemptId,
                           int seconds,
                           java.lang.String[][] savedMap)
                    throws java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Sets all attributes connected to the attempt to be displayed, including changing the map Method called when loading an already started attempt, setting autosave to true.
        Parameters:
        attemptId - The Attempt.id of the Attempt to be displayed
        seconds - The seconds stored in the attempt
        savedMap - The map of numbers that the user entered that is stored in the attempt
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        private void onHintButtonClick()
        Function that gives the player a hint, if the current solution up to the point the player clicks on the button, is solvable it will add the following number in the correct position, otherwise it will tell the player that the current solution is not solvable.

      • onSaveButtonClick

        private void onSaveButtonClick()
        Function to save the started attempt and swap to the menu view

      • onSolveButtonClick

        private void onSolveButtonClick()
        Shows the solution to the current attempt, if the attempt has no solution asks the player if this one wants to see a solution to the problem

      • onValidateClick

        private void onValidateClick()
        Function to check if a finished problem is correct, if so, swaps to corresponding Ranking by Attempt

      • onBackButtonClick

        private void onBackButtonClick()
        Function to swap to the menu view

      • onHintButtonClick

        private void onHintButtonClick()
        Function that gives the player a hint, if the current solution up to the point the player clicks on the button, is solvable it will add the following number in the correct position, otherwise it will tell the player that the current solution is not solvable.

      • noSolution

        private void noSolution()
        Alert displaying that the current solution is not solvable
